languages.text: "Едва ли мои слова утешат тебя, элантах, но я убила предателя. Боюсь, Темные оставили слишком много шрамов в его хрупкой душе. Твой преданный мон-кай сломался... И я даровала ему быструю смерть. Вне позора предательства".

traits.locale_text: "Едва ли мои слова утешат тебя, элантах, но я убила предателя. Боюсь, Темные оставили слишком много шрамов в его хрупкой душе. Твой преданный мон-кай сломался... И я даровала ему быструю смерть. Вне позора предательства".

languages.text: "My words will hardly console you, elantach, but I killed the traitor. I fear the Dark Ones left too many scars on his fragile soul. Your loyal mon-keigh broke... So I gifted him a swift death. Free from the shame of betrayal."
languages.original_text: "Едва ли мои слова утешат тебя, элантах, но я убила предателя. Боюсь, Темные оставили слишком много шрамов в его хрупкой душе. Твой преданный мон-кай сломался... И я даровала ему быструю смерть. Вне позора предательства".

traits.locale_text: "My words will hardly console you, elantach, but I killed the traitor. I fear the dark cousins left too many scars on his fragile soul. Your loyal mon-keigh broke... So I gifted him a swift death. Free from the shame of betrayal."

languages.text: “或许我的话语无法安慰到你，外界人，但确实是我杀了那个叛徒。我担心黑暗之民在他脆弱的灵魂上留下了太多伤痕，那位曾对你忠心耿耿的猴子崩溃了……于是我干净利落地送他上路，让他从背叛的耻辱中获得了解脱。”
languages.original_text: "My words will hardly console you, elantach, but I killed the traitor. I fear the Dark Ones left too many scars on his fragile soul. Your loyal mon-keigh broke... So I gifted him a swift death. Free from the shame of betrayal."

traits.locale_text: “或许我的话语无法安慰到你，外界人，但确实是我杀了那个叛徒。我担心黑暗之民在他脆弱的灵魂上留下了太多伤痕，那位曾对你忠心耿耿的猴子崩溃了……于是我干净利落地送他上路，让他从背叛的耻辱中获得了解脱。”

languages.original_text: "My words will hardly console you, elantach, but I killed the traitor. I fear the Dark Ones left too many scars on his fragile soul. Your loyal mon-keigh broke... So I gifted him a swift death. Free from the shame of betrayal."

languages.text: «Mis palabras no te traerán mucho consuelo, elantach, pero maté al traidor. Me temo que los Oscuros dejaron demasiadas cicatrices en su frágil alma. Tu leal mon-keigh estaba roto... de modo que le otorgué una muerte rápida. Libre de la vergüenza de su traición».
languages.original_text: "My words will hardly console you, elantach, but I killed the traitor. I fear the Dark Ones left too many scars on his fragile soul. Your loyal mon-keigh broke... So I gifted him a swift death. Free from the shame of betrayal."

traits.locale_text: «Mis palabras no te traerán mucho consuelo, elantach, pero maté al traidor. Me temo que los Oscuros dejaron demasiadas cicatrices en su frágil alma. Tu leal mon-keigh estaba roto... de modo que le otorgué una muerte rápida. Libre de la vergüenza de su traición».

languages.text: 「エランタ、私の言葉は慰めにはならないだろうが、裏切り者を殺したのは私だ。私は彼の脆弱な魂に数多の傷を残した闇の者を恐れた。あなたの忠実なモン＝ケイは壊れた…だから速やかな死を与えた。裏切りという恥から解放するために」
languages.original_text: "My words will hardly console you, elantach, but I killed the traitor. I fear the Dark Ones left too many scars on his fragile soul. Your loyal mon-keigh broke... So I gifted him a swift death. Free from the shame of betrayal."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、私の言葉は慰めにはならないだろうが、裏切り者を殺したのは私だ。私は彼の脆弱な魂に数多の傷を残した闇の者を恐れた。あなたの忠実なモン＝ケイは壊れた…だから速やかな死を与えた。裏切りという恥から解放するために」

languages.text: "Meine Worte werden Euch wohl kaum trösten, Elantach, doch ich habe den Verräter getötet. Ich fürchte, die Dunklekn haben zu viele Narben auf seiner fragilen Seele hinterlassen. Euer treuer Chem-Pan-Sey wurde gebrochen ... Darum habe ich ihm einen schnellen Tod geschenkt. Frei von der Schande des Verrats."
languages.original_text: "My words will hardly console you, elantach, but I killed the traitor. I fear the Dark Ones left too many scars on his fragile soul. Your loyal mon-keigh broke... So I gifted him a swift death. Free from the shame of betrayal."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Worte werden Euch wohl kaum trösten, Elantach, doch ich habe den Verräter getötet. Ich fürchte, die Dunklekn haben zu viele Narben auf seiner fragilen Seele hinterlassen. Euer treuer Chem-Pan-Sey wurde gebrochen ... Darum habe ich ihm einen schnellen Tod geschenkt. Frei von der Schande des Verrats."

languages.text: « Ma réponse ne suffira pas à vous consoler, elantach, mais oui, j'ai tué le traître. Malheureusement, les nombreuses blessures infligées à son âme fragile par les Eldars noirs ont fini par briser votre mon-keigh... Je lui ai donc offert une mort rapide, pour le libérer de la honte de la trahison. »
languages.original_text: "My words will hardly console you, elantach, but I killed the traitor. I fear the Dark Ones left too many scars on his fragile soul. Your loyal mon-keigh broke... So I gifted him a swift death. Free from the shame of betrayal."

traits.locale_text: « Ma réponse ne suffira pas à vous consoler, elantach, mais oui, j'ai tué le traître. Malheureusement, les nombreuses blessures infligées à son âme fragile par les Eldars noirs ont fini par briser votre mon-keigh... Je lui ai donc offert une mort rapide, pour le libérer de la honte de la trahison. »

languages.text: "Seni avutmak için ne desem boş elantach ama haini öldürdüm. Karalar'ın, kırılgan ruhuna çok fazla yara açtığından endişelendim. O sana sadık mon-keigh'den eser kalmamıştı... Ben de ona ihanetin utancından uzak, hızlı bir ölüm hediye ettim."
languages.original_text: "My words will hardly console you, elantach, but I killed the traitor. I fear the Dark Ones left too many scars on his fragile soul. Your loyal mon-keigh broke... So I gifted him a swift death. Free from the shame of betrayal."

traits.locale_text: "Seni avutmak için ne desem boş elantach ama haini öldürdüm. Karalar'ın kırılgan ruhuna çok fazla yara açtığından endişelendim. Senin o sadık mon-keigh'den eser kalmamıştı... Ben de ona ihanetin utancından uzak, hızlı bir ölüm hediye ettim."
